title: FormGenie
description: FormGenie lets you create and edit forms effortlessly using natural language—just describe what you need, and it builds it for you. Refine forms with simple commands, no manual setup is required. Once responses come in, chat with your database to analyze results in plain language, uncover insights, and identify trends instantly. Whether for surveys, feedback, or data collection, FormGenie streamlines the entire process, making form creation and analysis more intuitive than ever.
